name: VisxSDK
summary: VIS.X SDK® enables publishers access to VIS.X’s high-impact programmatic advertising on their in-app inventory.
description: VIS.X® is a new and unique kind of advertising technology that enables efficient execution of media and high-impact ad products at scale. VIS.X® wraps the inventory in a holistic auction offering all available products in one transaction to buyers, consequently optimizing the bidstream. YOC has developed this platform to unlock the real value of digital advertising – making VIS.X® the go-to-platform for high-impact programmatic advertising.
